articles.title: Wallabies; Eddie Jones adamant winless team can win World Cup
articles.description: Two losses to start his highly-anticipated second coaching stint with the Wallabies, including a loss to Argentina in Sydney, have not deterred Eddie Jones’ belief his team can win the World Cup.
articles.content:
Two losses to start his highly-anticipated second coaching stint with the Wallabies, including a loss to Argentina in Sydney, have not deterred Eddie Jones’ belief his team can win the World Cup.
After the back-to-back losses, including up smashing b... [2127 chars]

articles.title: Argentina's economic activity down 5.5% in May, lower than expected
articles.description: Agriculture and fishing also had the worst result for the month in April. Argentina is battling inflation of over 100%, with around four-in-10 people living in poverty.
articles.content:
Argentina's economic activity fell 5.5% in May from a year earlier, the country's official statistics agency said on Tuesday, lower than the 3.2% expected by a Refinitiv poll as farming production slid.
The South American nation is the world's top ex... [915 chars]

articles.title: Inter Miami transfer news, rumors: Lionel Messi officially announced as designated player; Jordi Alba close
articles.description: The Argentina legend is now part of the club and could debut next week
articles.content: Inter Miami could be on the path to redefining what it means to be an MLS team in the transfer market. After Lionel Messi has officially joined the team, the Herons expect to make at least five additional signings after also appointing Tata Martino a... [10889 chars]

articles.title: Amateur soccer player found dead in Argentina after attack on referee goes viral
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — A player from an amateur soccer league in Buenos Aires was found dead with a gunshot wound to his head shortly after being charged with attempted homicide for a violent assault against a referee during a match last week
articles.content: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — A player from an amateur soccer league in Buenos Aires was found dead with a gunshot wound to his head shortly after being charged with attempted homicide for a violent assault against a referee during a match last week... [2123 chars]
